                  $(document).ready(function(){
                    if ($(document).find('#oe_main_menu_navbar').length == 0){
                        $(".home_header").css({"margin-top":"0px"});
                    }
                     // Slideshow 4
                      $("#slider4").responsiveSlides({
                        auto: true,
                        pager:true,
                        nav:true,
                        speed: 500,
                        namespace: "callbacks",
                        before: function () {
                          $('.events').append("
before event fired.");
                        },
                        after: function () {
                          $('.events').append("
after event fired.");
                        }
                      });
                      var scroll_start = 0;
                      var startchange = $('.banner');
                      var offset = startchange.offset();
                      $(document).scroll(function() {
                        scroll_start = $(this).scrollTop();
                        if(scroll_start > offset.top) {
                            $('.banner').css('background-color', 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)');
                         } else {
                            $('.banner ').css('background-color', 'transparent');
                         }
                     });
                  });

                  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
  
                  ga('create', _.str.trim(''), 'auto');
                  ga('send','pageview');
